question: What is the name of the special campaign launched by the Prime Minister to free India of garbage?
explanation:
The Indian Prime Narendra Modi has launched a week-long campaign named ‘Gandagi Mukt Bharat’ to free India of garbage.
While delivering the inaugural address at the launch of the Rashtriya Swachhata Kendra near Raj Ghat, Delhi, the Prime Minister launched the campaign. This week-long campaign to free India of garbage will be till August 15.
